name: Charged Rounds {VAL}
description: Charged rounds grants electric or ARC damage equal to: {VAL}

name: Servo Boost {VAL}
description: Grants the Titan extended movement capabilities while moving on the ground equal to: {VAL}

name: Smart IFF Tagging
description: Allows friendly fire to pass your placed cover while still blocking enemy fire.

name: Tactical Equipment
description: Tactical Equipment, a deployable that supports a titans loadout.

name: Ordinance
description: Ordinance used by a titan. These are mainly Auxiliary slots, but could also be used in a titans active ability.

name: Pilot Abilities
description: Pilot tasks that can be started outside your titan but must finish the turn back inside your titan.
